memberdef.name: SOUI_ATTRS_BEGIN
memberdef.initializer: public: \ virtual HRESULT SetAttribute( \ const SOUI::SStringW & strAttribName, \ const SOUI::SStringW & strValue, \ BOOL bLoading=FALSE) \ { \ HRESULT hRet = E_FAIL; \

memberdef.name: SOUI_ATTRS_END
memberdef.initializer: if(FAILED(hRet)) return __super::SetAttribute( \ strAttribName, \ strValue, \ bLoading \ ); \ return AfterAttribute(strAttribName,strValue,bLoading,hRet);\ } \

memberdef.name: SOUI_ATTRS_BREAK
ATTR_CHAIN
memberdef.initializer: if (FAILED(hRet) && SUCCEEDED(hRet = varname.SetAttribute(strAttribName, strValue, bLoading))) \ { \ hRet |= flag; \ } \ else \

memberdef.name: ATTR_CHAIN_PTR
memberdef.initializer: if (FAILED(hRet) && varname!= NULL && SUCCEEDED(hRet = varname->SetAttribute(strAttribName, strValue, bLoading))) \ { \ hRet |= flag; \ } \ else \

memberdef.name: ATTR_CUSTOM
memberdef.initializer: if (0 == strAttribName.CompareNoCase(attribname)) \ { \ hRet = func(strValue, bLoading); \ } \ else \

memberdef.name: STRINGASBOOL
memberdef.initializer: (strValue).CompareNoCase(L"0") != 0 && (strValue).CompareNoCase(L"false") != 0

memberdef.name: ATTR_BOOL
memberdef.initializer: if (0 == strAttribName.CompareNoCase(attribname)) \ { \ varname=STRINGASBOOL(strValue); \ hRet = allredraw ? S_OK : S_FALSE; \ } \ else \

memberdef.name: ATTR_LAYOUTSIZE

memberdef.name: ATTR_LAYOUTSIZE2
memberdef.initializer: if (0 == strAttribName.CompareNoCase(attribname)) \ { \ SStringWList values; \ if(SplitString(strValue,L',',values)!=2) return E_INVALIDARG;\ varname[0]=GETLAYOUTSIZE(values[0]); \ varname[1]=GETLAYOUTSIZE(values[1]); \ hRet = allredraw ? S_OK : S_FALSE; \ } \ else \

memberdef.name: ATTR_LAYOUTSIZE4
memberdef.initializer: if (0 == strAttribName.CompareNoCase(attribname)) \ { \ SStringWList values; \ if(SplitString(strValue,L',',values)!=4) return E_INVALIDARG;\ varname[0]=GETLAYOUTSIZE(values[0]); \ varname[1]=GETLAYOUTSIZE(values[1]); \ varname[2]=GETLAYOUTSIZE(values[2]); \ varname[3]=GETLAYOUTSIZE(values[3]); \ hRet = allredraw ? S_OK : S_FALSE; \ } \ else \

memberdef.name: ATTR_MARGIN
memberdef.initializer: if (0 == strAttribName.CompareNoCase(attribname)) \ { \ SStringWList values; \ if(SplitString(strValue,L',',values)!=4) return E_INVALIDARG;\ varname.left=GETLAYOUTSIZE(values[0]).toPixelSize(100); \ varname.top=GETLAYOUTSIZE(values[1]).toPixelSize(100); \ varname.right=GETLAYOUTSIZE(values[2]).toPixelSize(100);\ varname.bottom=GETLAYOUTSIZE(values[3]).toPixelSize(100);\ hRet = allredraw ? S_OK : S_FALSE; \ } \ else \

detaileddescription.para:
v1.0
SOUI group
2014/08/15
Describe 定义SOUI的XML属性解析宏

codeline.highlight: //ATTR_IMAGE:直接使用IResProvider::LoadImage创建SOUI::IBitmap对象，创建成功后引用计数为1
//不需要调用AddRef，但是用完后需要调用Release
